com.tablecomponent

Class TableComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tablecomponent.TableComponent

  • public class TableComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    Class TableComponent is able to read CSV data, perform query operations on them, sorting query results and also export results into formats like HTML and CSV.
    Author:
    Petr

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableComponent()
      Constructor create new table component.
      TableComponent(java.lang.String csvFileName, char csvSeparator)
      Constructor create new table component and read CSV file with given separator.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeQuery(java.lang.String country, java.lang.String quartal)
      Execute query on CSV file with given criteria where Country = country and Quartal = quartal.
      java.lang.String[] executeQuery(java.lang.String country, java.lang.String quartal, java.lang.String vendor)
      Execute query on CSV file with given criteria where Country = country, Quartal = quartal and Vendor = vendor.
      void exportToCSV(java.lang.String fileName)
      Export current summary table to CSV file with default ';' separator for each cell
      void exportToHtml(java.lang.String fileName)
      Export current summary table to HTML file.

      Print loaded CSV file as table to standard output.

      Print current summary table to standard output.

      Read given CSV file with its separator.

      • executeQuery

        public void executeQuery(java.lang.String country,
                java.lang.String quartal)
        Execute query on CSV file with given criteria where Country = country and Quartal = quartal.
        Parameters:
        country - Given country
        quartal - Given quartal

      • executeQuery

        public java.lang.String[] executeQuery(java.lang.String country,
                              java.lang.String quartal,
                              java.lang.String vendor)
        Execute query on CSV file with given criteria where Country = country, Quartal = quartal and Vendor = vendor. Result will contain given vendor's share of units in percentage for specified quartal and country.
        Parameters:
        country - Given country where vendor sold units
        quartal - Given quartal where vendor sold units
        vendor - Given vendor
        Returns:
        Array with two items where first is amount of sold units and second is vendor's share for given quartal and country

      • vendorRowNumber

        public java.lang.String vendorRowNumber(java.lang.String vendor)
        Returns row number for given vendor in result summary table.
        Parameters:
        vendor - Given vendor
        Returns:
        String sentence with given vendor row number in result summary table.

      • sortBy

        public void sortBy(ColumnType type)
        Sort current result summary table by given column type.
        Parameters:
        type - Column type (e.g. VENDOR, UNITS)

      • exportToHtml

        public void exportToHtml(java.lang.String fileName)
        Export current summary table to HTML file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Given HTML filename

      • exportToCSV

        public void exportToCSV(java.lang.String fileName)

        Parameters:
